name: Space Michis
description:
Description:
This cat needs to get back all its fish cookies that are floating in space. Help it with its task and try to get as many cookies as possible. Stay away from the asteroids for as long as possible and have fun!

How To play:
To avoid the asteroids use the keyboard arrows or w-s-d keys to move up, down and forward (use the mouse to control the menu). You can't go back but you can go through the mysterious cloud to teleport you to the left side and get extra fish cookies. Message balloons will warn you when an asteroid is approaching. Try to get the highest score and challenge your friends!

Genre: Endless run

Platform: PC (Windows)

Final project from the EOI course "Design and Creation of Videogames with Unity"

Credits:
Development and 2D Art made by Susana Pérez Socorro

Music in title by Psychronic from https://pixabay.com/es/
Music in game from https://www.zapsplat.com
Sounds effects from https://www.kenney.nl/
